exceptions.exn: Illegal application (Non-functional construction): The expression "Hcoh" of type "s1 \\+ s2 \\In Coh (W1 \\+ W2)" cannot be applied to the term "l" : "Equality.sort Label"

original: intros Hcoh Hdom Hs1. assert (Hhook: hook_complete W1). { specialize (Hcoh l). move: Hcoh => [ _ _ Hhook _ ]. exact: Hhook. } assert (valid (W1 \+ W2)) as Hvalid. { move: Hcoh => [ Hvalid _ _ _ _ ]. exact: Hvalid. } move: (coh_split Hcoh Hhook) => [s1' [s2' [Hcoh1 Hcoh2 Heq]]]. rewrite -Heq. apply getSUn. - move: Hcoh1 => [Hvalid1 _ _ _ _]. exact: Hvalid1. - move: Hcoh => [Hvalid' _ _ _ Hdom']. rewrite -(Hdom' l Hdom). move: Hcoh1 => [_ _ _ Hdom1 _]. by rewrite -Hdom1. - move: Hcoh1 => [_ [Hval' _] _ _ ]. exact: Hval'.
